timeline.message: Prepped lease clients to add tags
Added tags to a bunch of APIs in BlobBase
Added tests for set tier tags
Added tags to rest of the APIs
Added get blob and get properties tests
Added set metadata and properties tests

timeline.bodyText: Is this a valid check here?
timeline.author: gapra-msft

replies.bodyText: I think so. We probably want to be doing this on all the constructor values.
replies.author: rickle-msft

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we should call the parameter ifTagsMatch or something? ifTags reads to me like it's just checking if there are tags present
timeline.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: There's a lot of over conditions that can be checked related to tags.  In .NET, we went with TagConditions
replies.author: seanmcc-msft

timeline.bodyText: I think options can be null here, right?
